thread.title: Calvin Harris weighs in on Taylor Swift split reports
thread.title_full: Calvin Harris weighs in on Taylor Swift split reports - CBS News

author: Lauren Moraski CBS News
title: Calvin Harris weighs in on Taylor Swift split reports
text:
Things are still going strong between lovebirds Calvin Harris and Taylor Swift, despite reports of the contrary.
Harris weighed in on social media shortly after a report surfaced about things turning sour between the red-hot music couple. The Scottish DJ blasted rumors that he had visited a Thai massage parlor in Hollywood last month.
"It's not going to be a 'happy ending' for everyone I sue for defamation of character for all these bulls*** stories bye bye," he tweeted late Monday.
View Gallery
Taylor Swift performs during the "1989" world tour at Staples Center on Aug. 22, 2015, in Los Angeles.
Matt Sayles/Invision/AP Swift's pal Selena Gomez, meanwhile, chimed in while paying a visit to Andy Cohen's SiriusXM radio show Monday.
"I think I would have found that out -- is that a rumor? This is honestly, it's so stupid," she said. "I'm pregnant every week, she's gonna be pregnant. It's so stupid. You can't really read that stuff."
Swift, 25, and Harris, 31, have been dating since earlier this year, going public with the relationship in May at the Billboard Music Awards . Since then, they haven't been shy about posting photos on Instagram.
